instructions.para: Enter the name of the language of the resource fully spelled out.
Enter the name of the language of the resource fully spelled out.
Enter the name of the language of the resource fully spelled out.

customization.para: Name of language(s) used in the interview fully spelled out.
Enter language names, fully spelled out, as they appear in the ISO 639 Code Tables "Language Name(s)" column. Note that Ladino is listed as such, and not as Judeo-Spanish or Judezmo.
Do not enter languages that only appear on the title page or final pages (i.e. in advertisements).
Separate multiple values using a semicolon and space (“; “).
Order of values does not matter.
Enter language names, fully spelled out, as they appear in the ISO 639 Code Tables "Language Name(s)" column. Note that Ladino is listed as such, and not as Judeo-Spanish or Judezmo.
Separate multiple values using a semicolon and space (“; “).
Order of values does not matter.
Enter language names, fully spelled out, as they appear in the ISO 639 Code Tables "Language Name(s)" column. Note that Ladino is listed as such, and not as Judeo-Spanish or Judezmo.
Separate multiple values using a semicolon and space (“; “).
Order of values does not matter.

history.created4Coll: University of Washington Tacoma Oral Histories
history.justification: MIG requested this field for UWT Oral Histories, allowing language to be indexed, as we do with other oral histories.

changeLog.change: Moved uwtoh instructions to a customization; created instruction for @co="all" to accommodate use of property with rp.
Add custom CO and standalone instructions and examples, and admin note, for Sephardic Studies Digital Collection (p16786coll3).
